source_caption_data.pre_caption: This is a scenery shot of a massive storm system. The video appears to be a time-lapse, capturing the dramatic movement of the dark clouds as they churn and roll across the sky. The storm moves over a flat, green landscape.
source_caption_data.pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
source_caption_data.final_caption: This is a scenery shot of a massive storm system. The video appears to be a time-lapse, capturing the dramatic movement of the dark clouds as they churn and roll across the sky. The storm moves over a flat, green landscape.

generated_critique: The caption includes the speculative phrase "The video appears to be a time-lapse" and the subjective adjective "dramatic," both of which should be avoided according to the instructions. The description should focus only on the visible motion. The opening phrase "This is a scenery shot of" is also unnecessary. A better caption would directly describe the motion of the clouds without speculation or subjective language. For example: "A massive storm system of dark clouds churns and rolls across the sky, moving over a flat, green landscape."
revised_caption_by_generated_critique: A massive storm system of dark clouds churns and rolls across the sky, moving over a flat, green landscape.
